title: What Is a “Rizz God” (& How Do You Become One)?

steps.title: A rizz god is someone who’s dripping with game.
steps.content: A rizz god is someone who’s dripping with game. If you’ve got rizz, you’re full to the brim with charisma and attract dates with ease. [1] X Research source But if you’re a rizz god or a rizz lord, you’re totally spittin’ game. You can get any hottie you want just by saying the right things and dropping a sultry smirk. Wow, see how Jarrod flirts with the ladies? I might be a rizz king, but he’s a straight-up rizz god!

steps.title: The word "rizz" was coined by Twitch streamer Kai Cenat.
steps.content: The word "rizz" was coined by Twitch streamer Kai Cenat. Cenat began using the word “rizz," short for “charisma," to describe that magnetic quality you see in people who can charm the socks off of anyone, usually someone they're interested in romantically or sexually. Want to know how much rizz you’ve really got? Take our quiz to find out!

steps.title: Be confident and don't put too much pressure on yourself.
steps.content: Be confident and don't put too much pressure on yourself. You can up your rizz by cultivating some zen while you're chatting up a babe at the local watering hole. We’re not saying you shouldn’t care about the person you’re talking to, but realizing you’ll still be OK even if they shoot you down can give you that Clooney-level magnetism you’re looking for.

steps.title: Ask questions when you’re not sure what to say to a cute stranger.
steps.content: Ask questions when you’re not sure what to say to a cute stranger. Not only does it take the pressure off of you to keep up a convo, but the truth is most people’s favorite subject is themselves. steps.title: Smile and maintain eye contact.
steps.content: Smile and maintain eye contact . Studies show people are charmed by eye contact and friendly faces, so a genuine grin and attentive eye contact are tools you’ll want to have in your rizz toolbelt. [3] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source

steps.title: Be funny and lighthearted.
steps.content: Be funny and lighthearted. Humor is a great way to keep a situation low-pressure, and it’s also super attractive. Just smile a lot, laugh at the other person’s jokes (even if they’re lame), and try to approach the conversation good-naturedly.
